name: Electric Field
description:
Electric Field is an arcade retro inspired game, an one screen bullet hell that for each round you must wisely place tesla coils that will power you within a certain radius with energy to electrocute your enemies.

Made for the Go Godot Jam 2.  Once the jam is over I plan to add some new enemies, maybe change the tesla coils dynamic a little and polish everything, so consider following me.

REMEMBER TO DASH!

Also important, if you are gonna use the web version, I suggest you to open in a new window, click F11 before hand and when you are over, get out with Alt-Tab or Win-Tab, so you can play full full screen.

Music from: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

Controls:

 WASD - move

 Left-Mouse - shoot/place tower

 Right-Mouse - delete tower

 1-2-3 - choose tower to place

 Shift - dash
